action.content:
You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There are red, purple, yellow, and orange shapes scattered around the image. The shapes are blocky and consist of squares connected to form various patterns.

You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Each of us can ask 3 questions. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors (dark blue, gray, green, light blue, and blue) arranged on a white background. The shapes are scattered and do not touch each other.

This is my DESCRIPTION: The image contains several Tetris-like shapes in different colors on a white background. There are red, purple, yellow, and orange shapes scattered around the image. The shapes are blocky and consist of squares connected to form various patterns.

QUESTION: Are there any shapes in your image that are touching or overlapping each other?
